programme.title: Without a Paddle
programme.desc: Childhood friends who have drifted apart but must reunite following the sudden death of a fourth friend.

programme.title: Kingpin
programme.desc: A star bowler whose career was prematurely "cut off" hopes to ride a new prodigy to success and riches.

programme.title: Scary Movie
programme.desc: Teenagers are stalked by a familiar masked movie madman in this parody slasher filled with razor-sharp satire.

programme.title: Scary Movie 2
programme.desc: The comedic characters of SCARY MOVIE are back in a film that scares up even more irreverent fun.

programme.title: Scary Movie 3
programme.desc: Thrillers, blockbusters and pop-culture get their best goosing yet in Scary Movie 3.

programme.title: Airplane!
programme.desc: An ex-fighter pilot is forced to take over the controls when the flight crew succumbs to food poisoning.

programme.title: Airplane II: The Sequel
programme.desc: There’s a mad bomber on board, the engines are not working, & the flight crew discovers they're out of coffee!

programme.desc: Frank Drebin bumbles across a mind control scheme to assassinate Queen Elizabeth.
